additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Juglans Regia (Walnut) Shell Powder, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycerin, Zea Mays (Corn) Kernel Meal, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Peg-100 Stearate, Cetyl Acetate, Sodium Chloride, Titanium Dioxide, Polysorbate 60, Sodium Sulfate, Ceteareth-20, Acetylated Lanolin Alcohol, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Fragrance, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Fruit Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Sodium Benzoate.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: WARNING: USE ONLY AS DIRECTED. AVOID CONTACT WITH EYES. IF EYE CONTACT OCCURS, IMMEDIATELY RINSE WITH WATER. IF RASH OR IRRITATION OCCURS, DISCONTINUE USE.

description: St Ives Fresh Skin Apricot Scrub
name: Fresh Skin Apricot Scrub
